export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
 
Suppose it it given that
\[
	z = \frac{\sqrt{p + 3 q } + \sqrt{p - 3 q }}{\sqrt{p + 3 q } - \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
Now prove that
\[
	3 q z ^2 - 2 p z + 3 q = 0
\]
\newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": "The given equation is
\[
	z = \frac{\sqrt{p + 3 q } + \sqrt{p - 3 q }}{\sqrt{p + 3 q } - \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
Now by using componendo and dividendo and simplifying we get
\[
	\frac{z + 1 }{z - 1 } = \frac{2 \sqrt{p + 3 q }}{2 \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
\[
\Rightarrow \frac{(z + 1)^2}{(z - 1)^2} = \frac{p + 3 q }{p - 3 q }
\]
Now using componendo and dividendo again, we get
\[
	\frac{(z + 1)^2 + (z - 1)^2}{(z + 1)^2 - (z - 1)^2} = \frac{(p + 3 q ) + (p - 3 q )}{(p + 3 q ) - (p - 3 q )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2z ^2 + 2 }{4 z } = \frac{2 p }{6 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{z ^2 + 1}{2 z } = \frac{p }{3 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 3 q z ^2 + 3 q = 2 p z 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 3 q z ^2 - 2 p z + 3 q = 0
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it it given that
\[
	z = \frac{\sqrt{p + 3 q } + \sqrt{p - 3 q }}{\sqrt{p + 3 q } - \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
Now prove that
\[
	3 q z ^2 - 2 p z + 3 q = 0
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "The given equation is
\[
	z = \frac{\sqrt{p + 3 q } + \sqrt{p - 3 q }}{\sqrt{p + 3 q } - \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
Now by using componendo and dividendo and simplifying we get
\[
	\frac{z + 1 }{z - 1 } = \frac{2 \sqrt{p + 3 q }}{2 \sqrt{p - 3 q }}
\]
\[
\Rightarrow \frac{(z + 1)^2}{(z - 1)^2} = \frac{p + 3 q }{p - 3 q }
\]
Now using componendo and dividendo again, we get
\[
	\frac{(z + 1)^2 + (z - 1)^2}{(z + 1)^2 - (z - 1)^2} = \frac{(p + 3 q ) + (p - 3 q )}{(p + 3 q ) - (p - 3 q )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2z ^2 + 2 }{4 z } = \frac{2 p }{6 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{z ^2 + 1}{2 z } = \frac{p }{3 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 3 q z ^2 + 3 q = 2 p z 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 3 q z ^2 - 2 p z + 3 q = 0
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
